Mary O'Donnell

  1. Foster Name: Mary
  2. Foster Family: John A. Foster
  3. Location of Family: Greeley, NE
  4. Sending Organization: Foundling Hospital
  5. Arrival Place: Unknown
  6. Age on Arrival: 2
  7. Date of Birth: 1909-04-13, New York City, NY
  8. Gender: female
  9. Married Name: Mary Sintek
  10. Spouse Name: Loyd A. Sintek
  11. Source: OTR 635; Eloise Thomsen Corres.
